meanings.definition: Caryatids: sculpted female figures serving as architectural support
meanings.sent1: The caryatids stood gracefully, holding up the roof with their outstretched arms.
meanings.sent2: The ancient temple was adorned with intricate caryatids supporting the grand structure.
meanings.sent3: The caryatids seemed to chat with each other as they held up the heavy building.
meanings.sent4: The caryatids bore the weight of the world on their shoulders, a symbol of strength and beauty.
meanings.sent5: Visitors marveled at the caryatids, their delicate features frozen in time.

meanings.definition: Caryatids: a group of caryatids used to support a structure
meanings.sent1: The majestic building was held up by a row of caryatids, each one playing a vital role.
meanings.sent2: Tourists admired the row of caryatids that formed a strong foundation for the ancient palace.
meanings.sent3: The caryatids took turns supporting the structure, like a team of silent helpers.
meanings.sent4: The caryatids stood together in unity, embodying the strength of teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The caryatids worked in harmony, their collective effort keeping the building steady.

meanings.definition: Caryatids: the caryatids were beautifully carved and added elegance to the building
meanings.sent1: Each caryatid was a masterpiece of art, enhancing the beauty of the entire structure.
meanings.sent2: The caryatids' intricate details brought a touch of sophistication to the plain building.
meanings.sent3: Passersby couldn't help but smile at the charming caryatids adorning the facade.
meanings.sent4: The caryatids seemed to dance in the moonlight, their grace captivating all who saw them.
meanings.sent5: The caryatids glowed in the sunlight, casting a magical aura over the entire building.
